panels.title: % jobs red on master, by hour
% commits red on master, by day
Jobs are ordered by "weight" (count * time), to reduce noise from jobs that only run a few times

panels.description: Failures on CircleCI runs on the master branch

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time,
       failing_jobs / (failing_jobs + passing_jobs) * 100 as "fail_percent"
FROM
  (SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at, 30m),
          sum(CASE
                  WHEN state != "success"
                       AND state != "pending" THEN 1
                  ELSE 0
              END) AS failing_jobs,
          sum(CASE
                  WHEN state = "success" THEN 1
                  ELSE 0
              END) AS passing_jobs
   FROM status_event
   WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
     AND json_unquote(json_extract(branches, "$[0].name")) = "master"
   GROUP BY 1
   ORDER BY $__timeGroup(updated_at, 30m)) AS nested

panels.title: CircleCI/Jenkins Master Fail %

panels.description: Failures on GHA runs on the master branch

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time,
       failing_jobs / (failing_jobs + passing_jobs) * 100 as "Fail Percent"
FROM
  (SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(workflow_job.completed_at, 30m),
          sum(CASE
                  WHEN workflow_job.conclusion != "success"
                       AND workflow_job.conclusion != "skipped"
                       AND workflow_job.conclusion != "cancelled" THEN 1
                  ELSE 0
              END) AS failing_jobs,
          sum(CASE
                  WHEN workflow_job.conclusion = "success" THEN 1
                  ELSE 0
              END) AS passing_jobs
   FROM workflow_job
   INNER JOIN workflow_run ON workflow_job.run_id = workflow_run.id
   WHERE workflow_run.head_branch = "master"
     AND $__timeFilter(workflow_job.completed_at)
   GROUP BY 1
   ORDER BY $__timeGroup(completed_at, 30m)) AS nested

panels.title: GitHub Actions Master Fail %

targets.rawSql:
select
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/master'
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

panels.description: Note: Bundled commits show up as a single revert

targets.rawSql:
select count(*) as "num_reverts"
from push_event
where ref = 'refs/heads/master'
    and head_commit_message like "Revert D%"
    and $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at);

panels.title: # Reverts

targets.rawSql:
select
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/viable/strict' and (head_commit_added!="[]" or head_commit_removed!="[]" or head_commit_modified!="[]")
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

select
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/nightly' and (head_commit_added!="[]" or head_commit_removed!="[]" or head_commit_modified!="[]")
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m),
       avg((unix_timestamp(t2.sync_last_update_at) - unix_timestamp(t1.sync_last_update_at)) / 60) "queue_time (m)"
FROM
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "queued"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t1
INNER JOIN
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "in_progress"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t2 ON t1.rerun_num = t2.rerun_num
AND t1.workflow_job_node_id = t2.workflow_job_node_id
AND t1.sync_last_update_at < t2.sync_last_update_at
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m)

SELECT concat("https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/actions/runs/", id) AS "url",
       name,
       head_sha,
       head_commit_message,
       updated_at
FROM workflow_run
WHERE head_branch = "master"
  AND conclusion = "cancelled"
  AND $__timeFilter(updated_at)
ORDER BY updated_at desc

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at,1h),
  count(*) AS "PRs created"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(created_at,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(closed_at,1h),
  count(*) AS "PRs created"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(closed_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(closed_at,1h)

SELECT
  author_association,
  count(*) AS "PR Count"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
GROUP BY author_association
ORDER BY created_at

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(completed_at, 30m),
        count(*) as "too long"
FROM workflow_job
INNER JOIN workflow_run ON run_id = workflow_run.id
WHERE workflow_run.head_branch = "master"
  AND $__timeFilter(completed_at)
  AND (unix_timestamp(completed_at) - unix_timestamp(started_at)) / 60 > 120
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(completed_at,30m)

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(completed_at, 30m),
        count(*) as "not too long"
FROM workflow_job
INNER JOIN workflow_run ON run_id = workflow_run.id
WHERE workflow_run.head_branch = "master"
  AND $__timeFilter(completed_at)
  AND (unix_timestamp(completed_at) - unix_timestamp(started_at)) / 60 <= 120
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(completed_at,30m)

panels.description: Note: This is ALL commits to PyTorch, not just to `master`!

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(head_commit_timestamp,1h),
  count(*) as "Commits"
FROM push_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(head_commit_timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(head_commit_timestamp,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(closed_at,1h),
  count(*) AS "PRs created"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(closed_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(closed_at,1h)

panels.title: Commits per Hour

targets.rawSql:
select starred_at as "time",
    pk_id+50339 as "star num" -- add the offset of stars to when we started recording events
from star_event
where action = "created" and $__timeFilter(starred_at);

select push_event.ref,
    status_event.sha,
    (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(status_event.updated_at)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from status_event
    inner join push_event on sha = push_event.head_commit_id
where push_event.ref = "refs/heads/master"
    and context like "ci/circleci: pytorch_python_doc_build"
    and state = "success"
order by updated_at desc
limit 1;

select push_event.ref,
    status_event.sha,
    (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(status_event.updated_at)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from status_event
    inner join push_event on sha = push_event.head_commit_id
where push_event.ref = "refs/heads/nightly"
    and context like "ci/circleci: pytorch_python_doc_build"
    and state = "success"
order by updated_at desc
limit 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(sync_last_update_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "completed"
FROM workflow_job_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) AND
  action = 'completed'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(sync_last_update_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(sync_last_update_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "queued"
FROM workflow_job_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) AND
  action = 'queued'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(sync_last_update_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(sync_last_update_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "started"
FROM workflow_job_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) AND
  action = 'started'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(sync_last_update_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,1h),
  count(*) as "Check Runs"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,1h)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(closed_at,1h),
  count(*) AS "PRs created"
FROM pull_request
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(closed_at)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(closed_at,1h)

SELECT time,
       failing_jobs,
       passing_jobs
FROM
  (SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(updated_at, 30m),
          sum(CASE
                  WHEN state != "success"
                       AND state != "pending" THEN 1
                  ELSE 0
              END) AS failing_jobs,
          sum(CASE
                  WHEN state = "success" THEN 1
                  ELSE 0
              END) AS passing_jobs
   FROM status_event
   WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at)
     AND context like "pr/pytorch-linux-bionic-rocm%"
   GROUP BY 1
   ORDER BY $__timeGroup(updated_at, 30m)) AS nested

panels.description: Failures across all sources (commits, PRs, nightlies)

targets.rawSql:
select context, count(*) as "num_failures"
from status_event 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) and state!="pending" and state!="success"
GROUP BY context
ORDER BY COUNT(*) desc;

panels.title: Top Failing Jobs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT concat("https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/actions/runs/", workflow_id) AS "url",
       concat(concat(suite, "."), name) AS "test_name",
       build_environment,
       ref,
       updated_at
FROM test_failures
WHERE branch = "master"
  AND $__timeFilter(updated_at);

panels.description: tests detected as flaky in all pytorch CI (both trunk and PRs)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  name,
  suite,
  file,
  sum(num_green) AS "num_green",
  sum(num_red) AS "num_red",
  sum(build_environment LIKE "%win%") AS "on_win",
  sum(build_environment LIKE "%linux%") AS "on_linux",
  sum(build_environment LIKE "%mac%") AS "on_mac",
  concat("https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/actions/runs/", workflow_id) AS "example_url",
  sum(isnull(pr)) AS "on_trunk",
  sum(not isnull(pr)) AS "on_prs"
FROM flaky_tests
WHERE $__timeFilter(updated_at) AND (isnull(pr) OR (pr <> "68754")) -- 68754 is my test PR with fake flaky tests
GROUP BY name, suite, file
ORDER BY "num_red"

panels.title: flaky tests

targets.rawSql:
SELECT head_commit_message, head_commit_author_username as "reverter", head_commit_id as "sha", head_commit_timestamp
FROM push_event
WHERE ref = "refs/heads/master"
  AND head_commit_message like "Revert D%"
  AND $__timeFilter(head_commit_timestamp)
ORDER BY head_commit_timestamp DESC;

select replace(
        replace(replace(workflow_job.labels, "]", ""), "[", ""),
        '"',
        ""
    ) as "instance",
    sum(
        UNIX_TIMESTAMP(workflow_job.completed_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(workflow_job.started_at)
    ) / 60 as "trunk_minutes",
    pr_query.total_minutes as "pr_minutes"
from workflow_job
    inner join push_event on workflow_job.head_sha = push_event.head_commit_id
    inner join (
        select workflow_job.labels as "instance",
            sum(
                UNIX_TIMESTAMP(workflow_job.completed_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(workflow_job.started_at)
            ) / 60 as "total_minutes"
        from workflow_job
            inner join push_event on workflow_job.head_sha = push_event.head_commit_id
        where push_event.ref != "refs/heads/master"
            and workflow_job.status = "completed"
            and workflow_job.labels != "[]"
            and $__timeFilter(workflow_job.completed_at)
            and $__timeFilter(workflow_job.started_at)
        group by workflow_job.labels
    ) as pr_query on pr_query.instance = workflow_job.labels
where push_event.ref = "refs/heads/master"
    and workflow_job.status = "completed"
    and workflow_job.labels != "[]"
    and $__timeFilter(workflow_job.completed_at)
    and $__timeFilter(workflow_job.started_at)
group by workflow_job.labels

panels.title: Execution time on master vs PR for workflow jobs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "cancelled"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'cancelled'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "success"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'success'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "failure"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'failure'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "skipped"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'skipped'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "action_required"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'action_required'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "success"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'success'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(started_at,10m),
  count(*) AS "failure"
FROM check_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(started_at) AND
  conclusion = 'failure'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(started_at,10m)

alert.message: Nightly hasn't been updated in over a day
alert.name: Last nightly update alert

targets.rawSql:
select
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() as "time",
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/nightly' and (head_commit_added!="[]" or head_commit_removed!="[]" or head_commit_modified!="[]")
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

select
  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() as "time",
  ref,
  head_commit_message, (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()) - 25200 - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(head_commit_timestamp)) / 60 / 60 as "hours_since_push"
from push_event
where ref='refs/heads/viable/strict' and (head_commit_added!="[]" or head_commit_removed!="[]" or head_commit_modified!="[]")
order by head_commit_timestamp desc 
limit 1;

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m),
       avg((unix_timestamp(t2.sync_last_update_at) - unix_timestamp(t1.sync_last_update_at)) / 60) "windows build (m)"
FROM
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "in_progress"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t1
INNER JOIN
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "completed"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t2 ON t1.rerun_num = t2.rerun_num
AND t1.workflow_job_node_id = t2.workflow_job_node_id
AND t1.sync_last_update_at < t2.sync_last_update_at
INNER JOIN workflow_job ON workflow_job.node_id = t1.workflow_job_node_id
INNER JOIN workflow_run ON workflow_job.run_id = workflow_run.id
WHERE workflow_job.name like "%build%" and workflow_run.name like "%win%" and workflow_job.name != "generate-test-matrix" and workflow_job.conclusion = "success"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m)

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m),
       avg((unix_timestamp(t2.sync_last_update_at) - unix_timestamp(t1.sync_last_update_at)) / 60) "windows test (m)"
FROM
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "in_progress"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t1
INNER JOIN
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "completed"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t2 ON t1.rerun_num = t2.rerun_num
AND t1.workflow_job_node_id = t2.workflow_job_node_id
AND t1.sync_last_update_at < t2.sync_last_update_at
INNER JOIN workflow_job ON workflow_job.node_id = t1.workflow_job_node_id
INNER JOIN workflow_run ON workflow_job.run_id = workflow_run.id
WHERE workflow_job.name like "%test%" and workflow_run.name like "%win%" and workflow_job.name != "generate-test-matrix" and workflow_job.conclusion = "success"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m)

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m),
       avg((unix_timestamp(t2.sync_last_update_at) - unix_timestamp(t1.sync_last_update_at)) / 60) "linux build (m)"
FROM
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "in_progress"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t1
INNER JOIN
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "completed"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t2 ON t1.rerun_num = t2.rerun_num
AND t1.workflow_job_node_id = t2.workflow_job_node_id
AND t1.sync_last_update_at < t2.sync_last_update_at
INNER JOIN workflow_job ON workflow_job.node_id = t1.workflow_job_node_id
INNER JOIN workflow_run ON workflow_job.run_id = workflow_run.id
WHERE workflow_job.name like "%build%" and workflow_run.name like "%linux%"  and workflow_job.name != "generate-test-matrix" and workflow_job.conclusion = "success"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m)

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m),
       avg((unix_timestamp(t2.sync_last_update_at) - unix_timestamp(t1.sync_last_update_at)) / 60) "linux test (m)"
FROM
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "in_progress"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t1
INNER JOIN
  (SELECT dense_rank() over(PARTITION BY BINARY workflow_job_node_id
                            ORDER BY sync_last_update_at) AS "rerun_num",
          action,
          workflow_job_node_id,
          sync_last_update_at
   FROM workflow_job_event
   WHERE action = "completed"
     AND $__timeFilter(sync_last_update_at) ) AS t2 ON t1.rerun_num = t2.rerun_num
AND t1.workflow_job_node_id = t2.workflow_job_node_id
AND t1.sync_last_update_at < t2.sync_last_update_at
INNER JOIN workflow_job ON workflow_job.node_id = t1.workflow_job_node_id
INNER JOIN workflow_run ON workflow_job.run_id = workflow_run.id
WHERE workflow_job.name like "%test%" and workflow_run.name like "%linux%" and workflow_job.name != "generate-test-matrix" and workflow_job.conclusion = "success"
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(t1.sync_last_update_at, 30m)

select replace(
        replace(replace(workflow_job.labels, "]", ""), "[", ""),
        '"',
        ""
    ) as "instance",
    sum(
        UNIX_TIMESTAMP(workflow_job.completed_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(workflow_job.started_at)
    ) / 60 as "trunk_minutes",
    pr_query.total_minutes as "pr_minutes"
from workflow_job
    inner join push_event on workflow_job.head_sha = push_event.head_commit_id
    inner join (
        select workflow_job.labels as "instance",
            sum(
                UNIX_TIMESTAMP(workflow_job.completed_at) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(workflow_job.started_at)
            ) / 60 as "total_minutes"
        from workflow_job
            inner join push_event on workflow_job.head_sha = push_event.head_commit_id
        where push_event.ref != "refs/heads/master"
            and workflow_job.status = "completed"
            and workflow_job.labels != "[]"
            and $__timeFilter(workflow_job.completed_at)
            and $__timeFilter(workflow_job.started_at)
        group by workflow_job.labels
    ) as pr_query on pr_query.instance = workflow_job.labels
where push_event.ref = "refs/heads/master"
    and workflow_job.status = "completed"
    and workflow_job.labels != "[]"
    and $__timeFilter(workflow_job.completed_at)
    and $__timeFilter(workflow_job.started_at)
group by workflow_job.labels

panels.title: Execution time on master vs PR for workflow jobs
